Omladina Narodne stranke 'platila' pretplatu za RTS 'novčanicama' sa likom Bujoševića

05 Nov 2019, 17:10









Omladina Narodne stranke danas je na ulazu u zgradu RTS-a ostavila vreću "novčanica" sa likom direktora te televizije Dragana Bujoševića, u protestnoj akciji povodom poskupljenja pretplate najavljenog za 1. januar 2020. godine.Predsednik omladine Narodne stranke Ivan Gajić izjavio je da je "lažni novac namenjen RTS-u jer su i informacije koje ta televizija pruža gradjanima u najvećoj meri lažne"."Navodni javni servis namerno prećutkuje sve informacije koje ne idu u prilog naprednjačkom režimu i gotovo da uopšte nije otvoren za kritiku vlasti, čime krši zakonsku obavezu o objektivnom informisanju gradjana, dok od njih istovremeno zahteva da plaćaju još veću pretplatu", istakao je Gajić.Na "novčanicama" iz perioda najveće hiperinflacije, koje je omladina Narodne stranke namenila Bujoševiću su, pored njegovog lika, i Aleksandar Vučić i drugi funkcioneri SNS-a.

People's Party youth 'paid' RTS subscription 'banknotes' with Bujosevic's character

05 Nov 2019, 16:10









People's People's Party left a bag of "banknotes" with Dragan Bujošević, the director of that television, at the entrance to the RTS building today, in a protest action over the price increase of the subscription announced for January 1, 2020. People's Party President Ivan Gajic said that "fake money for RTS because the information that television provides to citizens is mostly false." "The alleged public service deliberately silences all information that does not support the progressive regime and is hardly open to criticism of the authorities, thus violating the law. obligation to objectively inform citizens, while at the same time requiring them to pay an even larger subscription, "Gajic pointed out. On" banknotes "from the period of the greatest hyperinflation, which the youth of the People's Party intended for Bujošević, besides his character, Aleksandar Vucic and other officials SNS.
